author: Choo Han Teck J (delivering the judgment of the court):
casename: Khor Kok Soon v Public Prosecutor
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Choo Han Teck J; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Edmond Pereira (Edmond Pereira and Partners) and Chia Boon Teck (Chia Yeo Partnership) for the appellant; Han Ming Kuang and Lee Cheow Han (Deputy Public Prosecutors) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Criminal Law/Statutory offences/Arms Offences Act 1973 (Act No 61 of 1973)/Use of firearm with intent to injure/Trial judge finding that appellant used firearm with intent to injure/Whether trial judge should have given appellant benefit of doubt in view of long lapse in time and alleged inconsistencies in evidence/Section 4 Arms Offences Act 1973 (Act No 61 of 1973)
